scripts.build:02-astro: astro sync && astro check && astro build
scripts.validate-links: npx linkinator http://localhost:4321/svelte-tweakpane-ui --recurse --verbosity error --retry-errors-count 2 --retry-errors true --retry true --concurrency 1 --timeout 10000 --retry-errors-jitter 50 --skip www.linkedin.com
scripts.validate-links-live: npx linkinator https://kitschpatrol.com/svelte-tweakpane-ui --recurse --verbosity error --retry-errors-count 2 --retry-errors true --retry true --concurrency 1 --timeout 10000 --retry-errors-jitter 50  --skip www.linkedin.com
